message.content: Your mydlink password has been reset

message.name: subject
message.content: Verify your e-mail account

message.name: subject
message.content: Verify your e-mail account

message.name: contentText
message.content:
Hello #$firstName$#, Thank you for joining mydlink.
We have received your request to change your sign-in e-mail account. Old e-mail: dlink.usmp+changeEmailFour@gmail.com New e-mail: dlink.usmp+changeEmailFive@gmail.com
Before clicking on the below link to verify your e-mail address, PLEASE be sure close any applications signed in to mydlink, including any browsers logged into the mydlink website. Please click the link below to verify your e-mail address: #$URL$#
If clicking the link doesn't work, copy and paste the URL address into Internet Explorer.
If you have received this e-mail in error, please ignore this e-mail and we apologize for the inconvenience.
#$DNSName$#. ======================================================= This e-mail message was sent from a notification-only address that cannot accept incoming e-mail. Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please contact mydlink customer service at at #$DNSName$#/content/contact =======================================================

message.name: subject
message.content: Your mydlink password has been reset

message.name: contentText
message.content:
Hello #$firstName$#,
We have received a request to recover your password. Your mydlink sign-in password is: #$password$#
Please use your new password when signing in to #$DNSName$#
======================================================= To keep your information safe, please change your password by selecting Change Password in the My Profile section after signing in to mydlink. This e-mail message was sent from a notification-only address that cannot accept incoming e-mail. Please do not reply to this message.
If you have any questions, please contact mydlink customer service at #$DNSName$#/content/contact =======================================================
